## Introduction

The HIRN Resource Browser has an API for both **retrieving** and **loading** resources programmatically: https://resourcebrowser.hirnetwork.org/swagger/ui/index. While the API can be used with curl in Linux, for those who want to use R this package offers some convenience functions and examples of using the API for both purposes.

```{r setup}
library(Sourcery)
```
